      • location

        java.awt.Point location()
        get the location. Note, we needn't supply meaning to this until we actually draw on our canvas. So, it could be the center, or the top-leftmost point, etc.
        Returns:
        object's location on the canvas

      • location

        void location(java.awt.Point l)
        set the location. Note, we needn't supply meaning to this until we actually draw on our canvas. So, it could be the center, or the top-leftmost point, etc.
        Parameters:
        object's - location on the canvas

      • move

        move (translate) the object.
        Parameters:
        dx - - move to the right (left if negative)
        dy - - move down (up if negative)
